title: Broken links
body:
After build site:

```sh
htmlproofer --assume-extension .
```

- [ ] ./EIPS/eip-1.html
  *  External link https://gitter.im/ethereum/topics failed: 404 No error
- [ ] ./EIPS/eip-1077.html
  *  External link https://github.com/uport-project/uport-identity/blob/develop/docs/txRelay.md failed: 404 No error
- [ ] ./EIPS/eip-1123.html
  *  External link https://github.com/ethpm/ethpm-spec/tree/v2.0.0/spec/package.spec.json failed: 404 No error
- [ ] ./EIPS/eip-1202.html
  *  External link https://github.com/xinbenlv/eip-1202-draft/blob/master/contracts/advanced-version/AdvancedTokenVote1202.sol failed: 404 No error
  *  External link https://github.com/xinbenlv/eip-1202-draft/blob/master/contracts/simple-version/SimplestVote1202.sol failed: 404 No error
  *  External link https://github.com/xinbenlv/eip-1202-draft/blob/master/contracts/simple-version/TokenVote1202.sol failed: 404 No error
- [ ] ./EIPS/eip-1271.html
  *  External link https://etherdelta.com/ failed: 503 No error
- [ ] ./EIPS/eip-1474.html
  *  External link https://cpp-ethereum.org failed: got a time out (response code 0)
- [ ] ./EIPS/eip-1484.html
  *  External link https://decentralized.id/ failed: got a time out (response code 0)
- [ ] ./EIPS/eip-1581.html
  *  External link https://https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/blob/master/bip-0044.mediawiki failed: response code 0 means something's wrong.
             It's possible libcurl couldn't connect to the server or perhaps the request timed out.
             Sometimes, making too many requests at once also breaks things.
             Either way, the return message (if any) from the server is: Couldn't resolve host name
- [ ] ./EIPS/eip-1588.html
  *  External link https://github.com/naikmyeong failed: 404 No error
- [ ] ./EIPS/eip-1620.html
  *  External link http://chronosprotocol.org/chronos-white-paper.pdf failed: response code 0 means something's wrong.
             It's possible libcurl couldn't connect to the server or perhaps the request timed out.
             Sometimes, making too many requests at once also breaks things.
             Either way, the return message (if any) from the server is: Couldn't resolve host name
- [ ] ./EIPS/eip-1767.html
  *  External link https://github.com/PegaSysEng/pantheon/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#111 failed: 404 No error
- [ ] ./EIPS/eip-1775.html

- [ ] ./EIPS/eip-1967.html

- [ ] ./EIPS/eip-2003.html
  *  External link https://ethereum.github.io/evmc/structevmc__instance.html#a0823ebff21f9b0395b157e8c6b14a207 failed: 404 No error

- [ ] ./EIPS/eip-616.html

- [ ] ./EIPS/eip-725.html

- [ ] ./EIPS/eip-884.html

- [ ] ./EIPS/eip-897.html
  *  External link https://github.com/aragon/aragonOS/blob/dev/contracts/apps/AppProxyPinned.sol failed: 404 No error
  *  External link https://github.com/aragon/aragonOS/blob/dev/contracts/apps/AppProxyUpgradeable.sol failed: 404 No error
  *  External link https://github.com/aragon/aragonOS/blob/dev/contracts/kernel/KernelProxy.sol failed: 404 No error
- [ ] ./EIPS/eip-900.html
  *  External link https://github.com/maticnetwork/contracts/blob/master/contracts/StakeManager.sol failed: 404 No error
- [ ] ./EIPS/eip-902.html
- [ ] ./EIPS/eip-908.html
  *  External link https://notes.ethereum.org/SCIg8AH5SA-O4C1G1LYZHQ# failed: got a time out (response code 0)

  *  External link https://gitter.im/ethereum/topics/topic/5ac4d974109bb043328911ce/eip-969-discussion failed: 404 No error
- [ ] ./EIPS/eip-999.html
  *  External link https://github.com/paritytech/parity/compare/a5-eip999-poc failed: 404 No error
- [x] ./erc.html
  *  External link https://github.com/pizza_r0b failed: 404 No error
htmlproofer 3.10.2 | Error:  HTML-Proofer found 92 failures!
I don't think there's anything what can be done here.

This is the current status:
```

             Sometimes, making too many requests at once also breaks things.
```

Still I think there's nothing to be done about this and suggest to close the issue.
